encodedQuestions(uint256).details: Encoded questions parameters, needed to create and reopen a question

getQuestionsCount().details: Multi Scalar markets have one question for each outcome, while any other market has only one question.

returns._0: questionsCount The number of Reality questions of this market

params._lowerBound: Lower bound, only used for scalar markets
params._outcomes: The market outcomes, doesn't include the INVALID_RESULT outcome
params._upperBound: Upper bound, only user for scalar markets

numOutcomes().details: Returns the number of outcomes. Doesn't include the INVALID_RESULT outcome.

parentMarket().details: The parent market (optional). This market redeems to an outcome token of the parent market.

parentOutcome().details: The parent outcome (optional). The parent market's outcome token this market redeems for.

questionsIds(uint256).details: Multi scalar markets have two or more questions, the other market types have 1

resolve().details: Helper function to resolve the market

templateId().details: The templateId associated to the Reality question
